nl: Suppose that $f(x)=\sum_{i=0}^{\infty} c_{i} x^{i}$ is a power series for which each coefficient $c_{i}$ is 0 or 1 . Show that if $f(2 / 3)=3 / 2$, then $f(1 / 2)$ must be irrational.
candidate: ∀ {c : ℕ → ℕ} (hc : ∀ i, c i = 0 ∨ c i = 1) (h_add_3_2 : (∑ i in Finset.range (n+1), c i * (2/3)^i) = 3/2), ¬(∑ i in Finset.range (n+1), c i * (1/2)^i) = 2/3
